message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a valuable product that I believe will be of significant benefit to you.  I've priced it at $1,550,000, reflecting its inherent worth and the potential value it holds for your business.  I understand you value this product at $1,500,000, so this price represents a modest premium for the first buyer.  I'm confident that you'll see the advantage of securing this product at this competitive price. Please let me know your decision.
